officialTitle: Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Trial of Alvimopan in Major Spine Surgery
inclusionCriteria:
* Major spine surgery scheduled as part of clinical care
* 18-80 years
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 80 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* More than three doses of any opioid within one week of surgery
* Pregnancy
* Prisoners
* Unable to provide consent
* Emergency surgery
* Chronic kidney disease stage 5 (GFR \< 15 ml/min)
* Severe hepatic impairment
* Recent myocardial infarction (within the last 3 months)
